name: WeKanCode
tagline: Giving access to affordable & reliable technology
description:
WeKaCode is a Technology firm committed to delivering only the best technology solutions. With a team of hand-picked engineers from enterprise backgrounds, we have been able to leverage process driven work flows to build robust and scalable consumer level and enterprise platforms.
Because we understand that today intuitiveness and simplicity are key determinants of a product's success, we have put an emphasis on building a strong team of UI and UX designers that are constantly innovating in order to ensure the best user experience. 
More than a traditional development shop, WeKanCode is a hub for innovation. We invest in R&D and are constantly looking for startups with great ideas and great minds to partner with. 
READ MORE...
